text:
this is a new issue. Could you attach a sample of your build file, so that I see
how you invoke the mail task ?

<mail encoding="plain" ...>

I do not know see any direct usage of MailDateFormat in ant.

Cheers, Antoine.

text:
I do not know exactly why you are experiencing this problem, but it seems in
anycase not to be caused directly by ant, rather by the different external
libraries that you are using.
Have a look at this link :
http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jsp?forum=43&thread=241582&message=880712

and this one :

http://www.experts-exchange.com/Programming/Programming_Languages/Java/Q_20037474.html

I mark this issue as invalid, since this is not an ant issue.
